name: Nth-Last-Of-Type
description: The `:nth-of-type()` pseudo-class behaves like [`:nth-of-type`](https://css4-selectors.com/selector/css3/structural-pseudo-class/#nth-of-type-class 'CSS3: Structural pseudo class') but with the difference that the specified element siblings after it in the document tree will be selected.
example_description:
This example will select every even only `

` element and set a gray background.
